7 - large #22 64 october 14 - border instructions 65 october 21 - small #39 66 small #40 67 october 28 - large #23 68 november 4 - small #41 69 small #42 70 november 11 - large #24 71 november 18 - small #43 72 small #44 73 november 25 - large #25 74 **what to expect in this pattern** 1 general information including yarn requirements gauge and instructions for a practice square 2 one pdf per square pattern 3 a pdf with joining and border instructions 4 an empty chart for creating your own square patterns one for each size 5 support videos left and right handed 6 a consolidated pdf with all the instructions in one document at the end of the cal **technique and difficulty** intermediate - this pattern requires familiarity with starting and ending a tunisian crochet project as well as the following stitches us terms tunisian simple stitch tunisian double stitch tunisian treble stitch additionally knowledge of extended tunisian crochet stitches is necessary note this pattern is classified as intermediate but it can be considered advanced if you choose to use black yarn if you re new to this technique consider taking the course a guide to blackwork with tunisian mosaic crochet 75 before starting this cal **size** the final size of your squares will vary depending on the yarn you select the following measurements are based on the gauge mentioned in this pattern large squares 10 25 5 cm small squares 4 5 11 5 cm border 3 7 75 cm wide blanket 65 165 cm **yarn** for my blanket i used hawthorne dk yarn by wecrochet / knitpicks in the following colors gold hill tonal and blackbird kettle **hook** for my squares and the border i used a 6 5 mm k-10 5 tunisian crochet hook to join the squares and add the finishing touches to the blanket i used a 5 5 mm i-9 crochet hook **facebook group** join other participants and make your blankets together in my knitterknotter hangout group on facebook 76 **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with **@knitterknotter #knitterknotter #knitterknottertunisianblanketcal2022** so that i can find them **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com 1 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-blanket-cal-2025/ 2 https //knitterknotter
